content.text:
# Draft:Star Awards for Best Audio Personality

}}
Best Audio Personality
Award Details
Presented for: Outstanding achievement in audio hosting
First awarded: 2024
Best Audio Personality is an accolade awarded to outstanding radio or audio presenters who have demonstrated exceptional talent, popularity, and contribution to the broadcasting industry. This award is presented at the Star Awards in Singapore to recognize excellence in audio entertainment.
History
The Best Audio Personality award was first introduced in 2024 at the Star Awards in Singapore. It was created to recognize outstanding radio and audio presenters who have demonstrated exceptional talent and strong audience connection. Unlike earlier awards for radio popularity, this category focuses specifically on individual audio presentation excellence and broad influence across audio platforms.
Past Nominees and Winners
2024
Winner: Dennis Chew 周崇庆 —  早安! 玉建蔡煌崇 The Breakfast Quintet (LOVE 972)
Nominees:
Chen Ning 陈宁 — 大咖一起来 The DAKA Show (YES 933)
Hazelle Teo 张颖双 —  双节坤 The Shuang and Kunz Show (YES 933)
Lim Leng Kee 林灵芝 —  城市007 Double‑O‑7 (CAPITAL 958)
Zhong Kunhua 钟坤华 —  一点都不KUNZ KUNZversations (YES 933)
2025
Winner: Zhong Kunhua 钟坤华 — 双节坤佳 The Shuang, Kunz, Jia Trio (YES 933)
Nominees:
Chen Ning 陈宁 —  大咖一起来 The DAKA Show (YES 933)
Hazelle Teo 张颖双 —  双节坤佳 The Shuang, Kunz, Jia Trio (YES 933)
Pan Jia Biao 潘家镳 —  城市早点名 Wake Up Call (CAPITAL 958)
Zhu Zeliang 朱泽亮 —  Yeah 夜不打烊 The Night is Young (YES 933)
Significance
Winning the Best Audio Personality award is regarded as a mark of excellence and popularity. It boosts a presenter's reputation and helps establish them as a leading voice in the audio industry.
